alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 8:29PM CST until December 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with a light glaze of ice accumulations, mainly across Pine County. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph, mainly near Lake Superior. * WHERE...Pine, Central St. Louis and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area, the Fond du Lac Band and the Mille Lacs Band, Lena Lake and, Hinckley areas. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing and falling snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in the Twin Ports area creating near white-out conditions at times. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Pine
